name: biomni-find-alternative-drugs-ddinter
title: Biomni: Find Alternative Drugs Ddinter
description: Finds alternative drugs to avoid contraindicated drug-drug interactions
content:
Overview

Finds alternative drugs to avoid contraindicated drug-drug interactions using the DDInter database. Recommends therapeutically equivalent alternatives that minimize interaction risks while maintaining efficacy.

Input Parameters

  • target_drug (required): Drug name that needs to be replaced or has interactions
  • contraindicated_drugs (required): List of drugs patient is taking that interact with target drug
  • therapeutic_class (optional): Therapeutic class to constrain alternative suggestions
  • data_lake_path (optional): Path to custom DDInter database

Input Format

{
  "target_drug": "Simvastatin",
  "contraindicated_drugs": ["Clarithromycin", "Itraconazole"],
  "therapeutic_class": "HMG-CoA Reductase Inhibitors",
  "data_lake_path": "/path/to/database"
}

Biological Use Case

Essential for medication optimization in patients experiencing drug-drug interactions. Supports clinical pharmacists and physicians in selecting safer alternatives while maintaining therapeutic equivalence. Particularly valuable in polypharmacy scenarios where switching one drug can resolve multiple interaction issues.

Output

List of alternative drug recommendations with interaction profiles, therapeutic equivalence assessments, and dosing considerations saved to alternative_drugs_results.txt

Category

pharmacology
